Torishiro Rento-sha (ni) oite Yoshida-Katsunori saku(tsukuru)
(Tame) Shimizu toshio kun 
 
Katsunori-Yoshida made it at Torishro sword making factory/work shop
For Mr. Toshio-Shimizu
 
Showa 19(1944) Feb. Lucky day.
 
I am watching this study group for one week.
Very interesting.
Best wishes from The Netherlands,

John Klein Nagelvoort
